properties.displayName: (Preview) Login from an unusual region via Palo Alto GlobalProtect account logins

thresholdObservations.name: Score
thresholdObservations.description: Generate an anomaly when a region rarity score is less than the threshold.

thresholdObservations.name: Minimum users per region
thresholdObservations.description: whitelist an anomaly if the number of users from a rare region is greater than this limit.

properties.displayName: (Preview) Multi-region logins in a single day via Palo Alto GlobalProtect

singleSelectObservations.name: Use region adjacency
singleSelectObservations.description: Suppress anomalies originated from two adjacent regions.

thresholdObservations.name: Minimum daily regions for anomaly
thresholdObservations.description: Generate an anomaly when a user logs in from this many or more regions in a day

properties.displayName: (Preview) Potential data staging

prioritizeExcludeObservations.name: User allowlist
prioritizeExcludeObservations.description: Enter comma separated userids to be suppressed while triggering anomalies. This should be within double quotes and is case insensitive, example: "user@exmaple.com, app@sharepoint"

thresholdObservations.name: Number of distinct files dowloaded per day
thresholdObservations.description: Suppress anomalies when daily number of distinct files downloaded per day is less than the chosen value

thresholdObservations.name: Number of standard deviations
thresholdObservations.description: Triggers anomalies when number of standard deviations is greater than the chosen value

properties.displayName: (Preview) Suspicious geography change in Palo Alto GlobalProtect account logins

singleSelectObservations.name: Use region adjacency
singleSelectObservations.description: Suppress anomalies originated from two adjacent regions.

singleSelectObservations.name: Check for matching device
singleSelectObservations.description: Suppress anomalies which are originated from the same device.

properties.displayName: (Preview) Suspicious number of protected documents accessed

prioritizeExcludeObservations.name: File extension
prioritizeExcludeObservations.description: Give comma separated file extension to exclude from source data, for example: .txt,.jpg,.mp4

thresholdObservations.name: Score
thresholdObservations.description: Generate an anomaly when the error percentile is greater than chosen value
